DOC.brief_title: Docetaxel Plus Carboplatin Treating Patients With Stage III Stage IV Ovarian , Fallopian Tube , Primary Peritoneal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Evaluate response rate , duration response , progression-free overall survival previously untreated patient suboptimally debulked stage III stage IV ovarian carcinoma , fallopian tube carcinoma , papillary serous cancer uterus , primary peritoneal carcinoma treat docetaxel carboplatin . - Evaluate feasibility toxicity regimen patient . - Evaluate effect regimen quality life patient . OUTLINE : This open-label study . Patients receive docetaxel IV 1 hour carboplatin IV 30 minute day 1 . Treatment repeat every 21 day 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Quality life assess prior therapy every 3 course chemotherapy . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 14-40 patient accrue study within 2.5 year .
